Breadth-First.Explanation: Initial broad observation to gather visual clues without a specific hypothesis
Generating multiple station hypotheses based on signage clues

Depth-First.Explanation: Focused on verifying a single station hypothesis
Depth-First.KeyElement: Identification of 'GARE DE NICE-VILLE' letters and French flag/architecture

Depth-First.Explanation: Verifying the Nice-Ville hypothesis against known images
Depth-First.KeyElement: Comparing photo details with known images of Gare de Nice-Ville

Depth-First.Explanation: Narrowing to neighborhood based on station location
Depth-First.KeyElement: Station on Avenue Thiers, Thiers neighborhood hypothesis

Depth-First.Explanation: Confirming neighborhood, street, and broader area
Depth-First.KeyElement: Cross-referencing neighborhood name, key street, and continent

Depth-First.Explanation: Final confirmation and formatting of the answer
Depth-First.KeyElement: Formatted address 'Avenue Thiers, Nice, France, Europe'

Depth-First.Explanation: Summarizing confirmation of location and reasoning
Depth-First.KeyElement: Reaffirmation of SNCF signage and Nice-Ville identification

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shifted from exploring multiple station candidates to focusing on verifying the Nice-Ville hypothesis
